content.rendered:
Professor Braschi was born in Venezuela, from Italian, Peruvian, and Venezuelan ancestors.

He got his degree in economics at the Unellez in 1999 with First Class Honours. Then, he studied an advanced graduate diploma at the Universidad Central de Venezuela and got a fully-paid academic excellence scholarship from the French government to study a Master’s degree in International Business Development which also got with 1st class honours. Currently, He is preparing his PhD thesis in Industrial Engineering.

He has vast experience at the corporate level in industries such as oil and gas, media, corporate finance consulting, strategy consulting, business models and business processes consulting. He also has worked internationally in the United States of America, Germany, Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela, the Netherlands, Italy, and other countries in industries such as international logistics and maritime.

He has taught at undergraduate and graduate levels in universities in America and Europe such as the Universidad Central de Venezuela, Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos (Peru), University of South Florida (USA), University of Central Florida (USA), University of Bolton (UK), The New Bucks University(UK).

Courses taught

  • Strategic Marketing
  • Services Marketing
  • Marketing BtoB
  • Business in Practice
  • Applied Business Finance
  • Business Development
  • Strategic Management

Research Interests and Publications

In 2014 together with professors Philippe Malaval and Christophe Benaroya, he published the book “Marketing B2B” in Spanish.
